page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: To discover the density of traffic we organised a traffic survey on the B2096 Battle to Heathfield road.each timed study lasted 30 minutes. Obseration 1 9.30am-10am.186 vehicles. 150 cars 30 lorries/vans tractors/farm vehicles 2 bicyles 10 pedestrian. observation 2 11.30am-12 noon.103 82 cars 15 lorries/vans 5 tractors/farm vehicles 5 pedestians. observation 3 2.30pm-3pm 86 vehicles. 60 cars 15 lorries/vans 9 tractors/farm vehicles.How children travel to school.48 children travel on the Ashburnham/Bodle street coach.10 children travel on the Brightling coach.11 children travel on the Autopoint.37 children travel with perents by car/land rovers.3 children walk to and from school.
